          "url": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "https://absahr.service-now.com/myhrportal?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0011251 "

                ]
              }
            ],
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "label": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "Click here for detailed steps on how to complete the Manager Evaluation step that is part of the year-end review on Workday."
                  }
                ]
              }
            ],
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "header": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "Prior to completing the year-end performance review for the employee, the people manager should have engaged with the employee, as well as reviewed the self-evaluation and feedback that has been provided for the employee in Workday and other relevant data sources. Where necessary, the people manager should engage with other employees to clarify the feedback received, or obtain verbal feedback if insufficient feedback exists."
                  }
                ]
              }
            ],
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "linkType": "single",
          "introMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
